    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Customer Initialises Method which is run on Program Start. It sets the StaffID, StoreID and sets Default Values for the Date Fields. It creates the Dropdown-Items (All Store Names).

      • setDefaultCalDates

        private void setDefaultCalDates()
        Sets Default Values for all Calendars. Sets the Current Date Value into the Rental Start Calendar Date. Sets the Current Date Value + 28 Days into the Rental Expires Calendar Date. Sets the End Calendar Date to null.

      • initAllPopUps

        private void initAllPopUps()
        Calls the Initialise for all the PopUps for Rent-, Book- and BookSearch-List.

      • initPopUpRentList

        private void initPopUpRentList()
        Initialises the PopUpRentList. Buttons: show, del, can.

      • initPopUpBookSearchList

        private void initPopUpBookSearchList()
        Initialises the PopUpBookSearchList. Buttons: add, can.

      • initPopUpRentBookList

        private void initPopUpRentBookList()
        Initialises the PopUpRentBookList. Buttons: del, can.

      • rentOfPersonListViewControll

        private void rentOfPersonListViewControll​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
        Rent of CurrentSelected Person Controller. Load the BookList of the Selected Rent. OR Show PopUpRentList
        Parameters:
        event - MouseEvent: Detect if the Main or Secondary Mouse-Button was clicked.

      • rentCurrentListViewControll

        private void rentCurrentListViewControll​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
        Books of CurrentSelected Rent Controller. Show PopUpRentList if Secondary Mouse-Button was clicked.
        Parameters:
        event - MouseEvent: Detect if the Main or Secondary Mouse-Button was clicked.

      • bookListViewControll

        private void bookListViewControll​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
        BookList Controller of SearchBookList. Show PopUpRentList if Secondary Mouse-Button was clicked.
        Parameters:
        event - MouseEvent: Detect if the Main or Secondary Mouse-Button was clicked.

      • setExpCal

        private void setExpCal()
        Set the Date of the ExpiredCalendar to StartDate + 28 Days.

      • getSelectedRentIndex

        private int getSelectedRentIndex()
        Returns:
        int Returns the Current Selected Index of the RentList.

      • getSelectedBookIndex

        private int getSelectedBookIndex()
        Returns:
        int Returns the Current Selected Index of the RentBookList.

      • getSelectedBookSearchIndex

        private int getSelectedBookSearchIndex()
        Returns:
        int Returns the Current Selected Index of the BookSearchList.

      • getSelectedPersonIndex

        private int getSelectedPersonIndex()
        Returns:
        int Returns the Current Selected Index of the Person List.

      • getSelectedStoreIndex

        private int getSelectedStoreIndex()
        Returns:
        int Returns the Current Selected Index of the Store ComboBox + 1.

      • formatDateOfCal

        private java.lang.String formatDateOfCal​(java.time.LocalDate date)
        Formats LocalDate Value to String: yyyy-MM-dd
        Parameters:
        date - LocalDate Value
        Returns:
        String Value

      • getDateOfString

        private java.time.LocalDate getDateOfString​(java.lang.String date)
        Formats String (yyyy-MM-dd) to LocalDate Value. However, If the String is null, return null.
        Parameters:
        date - String Value
        Returns:
        LocalDate Value

      • clearRentBookList

        private void clearRentBookList()
        Clear the Content of the RentBookList.

      • clearPersonList

        private void clearPersonList()
        Clear the Content of the PersonList.

      • clearRentList

        private void clearRentList()
        Clear the Content of the RentList.

      • clearBookSearchList

        private void clearBookSearchList()
        Clear the Content of the BookSearchList.

      • createHeaderRentList

        private void createHeaderRentList()
        Create the Header for the RentList. It will act as an List Element. Also sets the Font to bold.

      • createHeaderBookRentList

        private void createHeaderBookRentList()
        Create the Header for the RentBookList. It will act as an List Element. Also sets the Font to bold.

      • loadPersonSearchData

        private void loadPersonSearchData()
        Load Person Matching the Search Criteria and Add them to the PersonSearchList.

      • loadPersonToLabel

        private void loadPersonToLabel()
        Get the selected Index of the PersonSearchList and write the Name to the TextField and set them as Customer.

      • loadBookSearchData

        private void loadBookSearchData()
        Load the Books from Database which are Free Between the Given start and end Date and Count them.

      • loadRentsOfPerson

        private void loadRentsOfPerson()
        Load all Rentals From the Selected Person.

      • loadBookListOfSelectedRent

        private void loadBookListOfSelectedRent​(int index)
        Load all Books From the Selected Rent and Calculate the Price.
        Parameters:
        index - The Index From the Selected Rent.

      • delRentOfPerson

        private void delRentOfPerson()
        Delete the Selected Rent from the Selected Person.

      • delRentBook

        private void delRentBook()
        Delete the Selected Book from the Selected Rent from the Selected Person.

      • createNewRent

        private void createNewRent()
        Create a new Rent with startDate = current Date, and Expires Date (current Date + 28 Days). The Selected Customer is the Owner of the Rent.

      • addBookToRent

        private void addBookToRent()
        Add the Selected Book from the BookSearchList to the Currently Selected Rent. To do so the Selected Book needs to get a free (between start- AND end-Date) Inventory ID.

      • updateRent

        private void updateRent()
        Update the Currently Selected Rent from the Customer with new Dates.
